# Parsley

## Common Names

Language|String
-|-
`en`|parsley
`sv`|persilja
`pt`|salsa


## Data

Key|Value
-|-
`botanial_name`|Petroselinum crispum
`botanical_family`|Apiaceae
`botanical_family_en`|Parsley family

`temp_c_min`|12.8

`temp_c_opt`|21.1
`ph_min`|5.5
`ph_max`|6.5
`ec_ms_min`|1.4
`ec_ms_max`|2.4


## Environmental Parameters

Measurement | Optimum Range | Source
